articles.title: American Serial Killer's Execution Stalled As 8 Lethal Injections Fail - NDTV
articles.description: Creech, a serial killer, was scheduled for execution following an exceptionally lengthy 43-year tenure on death row, marking one of the lengthiest periods in the history of US death row cases.
articles.content:
Creech, 73, was sentenced to death for the 1981 murder of a fellow inmate.
The scheduled execution of Thomas Eugene Creech, a convicted serial killer who spent decades on death row, was called off o… [+1759 chars]
